Class Game

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.games.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<PlayerWrapper>
@Entity public class Game extends Object implements Iterable<PlayerWrapper>
Represents a game session.
Author:
zacharyhayden

    • Game

      public Game(String saveGame, long gameid, List<PlayerWrapper> players, GameBoard gb)
      Creates a Game.
      Parameters:
      saveGame - optional fork of previously saved game; can be null
      gameid - unique game ID
      players - list of players in game session as indicated from the rest call
      gb - The gameboard
